name: Black Moor Castle
overview: You are desperately looking for the exit from the confusing Labyrinth of "Black Moore Castle" to the higher floors above, you need Keys you must jump to get as many are hanging from the ceiling. On your way to freedom you must dodge the desperate deathly obstacles and avoid the frenzied monsters. The exit from the inhospitable Castle "Black Moore" is located on the screen somewhere on the left side, there are four potential exits that lead to freedom, all hidden. Finally, remember that all castle visitors are under a huge time pressure , as your "life clock" almost expired! Published in Computronic 1985/03-04.
